posts.post_content:
Really looking for trades for [URL="http://sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=239&userset=5307"]SGC 40 singles I need[/URL] for the collection.  Would be willing to sell, however.

[S]Abbott SGC 50[/S] - TRADED
Clymer SGC 45
[S]H. Hinchman SGC 50[/S] - TRADED
[S]Kroh SGC 50[/S] - TRADED
Maloney SGC 55
Heinie Smith SGC 40
Stephens SGC 45

[URL="http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/sgc-graded"]Front and back scans of all are available[/URL]:

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sgc-graded/9088/clymer-bill[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sgc-graded/9110/maloney-billy[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sgc-graded/9126/smith-heinie[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/sgc-graded/9128/stephens-jim[/IMG]

I have Stephens, White pitching and Willis port in SGC 40.

I need all of yours except Clymer and Heine Smith.

Dialogue at [url]jacklitsch@comcast.net[/url]
